name: Recruitment for the Post of Clerk in Subordinate Courts of Haryana

details.description: SSSC invites applications for the post of Clerk in the Subordinate Courts of Haryana. Candidates with a bachelor's degree and proficiency in computer operations are encouraged to apply.
details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline from a recognized university and proficiency in computer operations.
details.selection_process: The selection process includes a written examination followed by a computer proficiency test.

name: Recruitment for the Post of Clerk in Subordinate Courts of Punjab

details.description: SSSC invites applications for the post of Clerk in the Subordinate Courts of Punjab. Candidates with a bachelor's degree and proficiency in computer operations are encouraged to apply.
details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline from a recognized university and proficiency in computer operations.
details.selection_process: The selection process includes a written examination followed by a computer proficiency test.

name: Recruitment for the Post of Stenographer Grade-III in Subordinate Courts of U.T. Chandigarh

details.description: SSSC invites applications for the post of Stenographer Grade-III in the Subordinate Courts of U.T. Chandigarh. Candidates with a bachelor's degree and proficiency in stenography are encouraged to apply.
details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline from a recognized university and proficiency in stenography.
details.selection_process: The selection process includes an English Shorthand Test, its transcription, and a computer proficiency test.
